settings.button_label_1: SAVE $400 & BOOK NOW WITH 3 FREE MONTHS OF ULTRABURN

settings.heading: RESTORE UNDER EYE VOLUME
settings.title: Under Eye Filler
settings.body: If the area around them is puffy or hollowed due to age and volume loss, it can make you appear tired, overwhelmed, or even worn. For such a delicate area of the face, even subtle concerns can make a big difference in how alert and fresh you appear. With JUVÉDERM® fillers, Balanced Aesthetics Medspa can restore your eyes to their brightest and freshest, so you look alert and ready for whatever comes your way.

settings.text: Having puffiness or hollowed-out areas under your eyes can give others the impression you’re not well-rested or are stressed. If you’re concerned these signs of aging are detracting from your appearance, schedule a consultation with Balanced Aesthetics Medspa to learn about how we can help.

However subtle it may be, the volume of the gel instantly lifts and smoothes your skin, so you see the visible improvement around your eyes right away. The HA molecules bring hydration back to your skin, giving it a soft appearance that combats signs of age. The gel itself gives volume to hollow areas, restoring your alert and fresh appearance so that a haggard, tired look goes away almost instantly. The effects may last up to 12 months with JUVÉDERM® Volbella™, diminishing slowly as the gel is safely metabolized. Maintenance treatments will help keep your appearance young and fresh-faced.

settings.question: How Do Dermal Fillers Work Under the Eye?
settings.answer:
For an area as expressive as the eyes, even the subtlest changes can make a big difference to your appearance. Time and age begin to take hold first in the collagen fibers, which give skin its youthful firmness. These fibers weaken, giving way to skin laxity that can cause wrinkles and allow the underlying tissues to shift downward. This causes the dreaded puffiness under the eyes and leaves room for hollows to develop.

At Balanced Aesthetics, we combat this with JUVÉDERM® dermal fillers, specifically JUVÉDERM® Volbella™. It’s a gel made up of hyaluronic acid (HA) molecules, which the body makes naturally to hydrate the skin. Volbella™ has a thinner consistency than some of the other JUVÉDERM® fillers, making it perfect for the delicate tissues around the eyes. Its spreadable nature gives us great control over its placement. By injecting it into the areas around the eyes, we can smooth away the hollows created by downward shifting tissues and fade wrinkles to nothing for a more youthful, bright-eyed appearance.

settings.question: What is the Treatment Like?
settings.answer: Each syringe of JUVÉDERM® Volbella™ contains lidocaine, an anesthetic designed to make your injections as pain-free as possible. We also use a cannula, which is a much more comfortable way of distributing the product to the targeted areas. Treating under-eye concerns is fast, taking our skilled injection specialists only 15-30 minutes to complete. After your treatment, you may resume your regular schedule.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: You may experience some mild redness or tenderness of the injection site, but these fade on their own within 24-48 hours.

settings.text: The eyes say a lot about who we are, and with JUVÉDERM® Volbella™, you can define how others see you. At Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, we’re ready to take years off your appearance with skill and experience in making our clients look their best every day.

Don’t forget to use your Allē points to receive discounts on all of your neurotoxin and filler needs!
